attributes.action: STOP TREATING PRISONERS BETTER THAN INNOCENT PEOPLE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lately all we the public have seen are
images of the fat prisoners,detainees,
who are literally being fed more than
our elderly.
What is going on? these people have
committed a crime and are in prison, not
a holiday camp.
Its about time these people were all
punished for their crimes, not given
the life of Riley.
This year thousands of families, elderly
and hard working people have worried
about where they will find the money to
buy the essentials, but in prison you
get well balanced meals and a choice,
most people outside have to get what they can afford.
This must stop, prison is a deterrant
not a hotel, in fact we pay more for a
holiday and get less than a prisoner.
Please see sense and end this madness
as it is not fair on the law abiding voters.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
